scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.release-apk: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*
scripts.reinstall: cd ..; yarn prepare && cd example; rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn && cd ios; pod install; cd ..
